OK No Yes Cancel
No standard app found Sorry, we could not find an app to open the file.
Permission required Do you want to give this permission? The app requires permission to access the camera, otherwise it will not work. The app requires permission to access your files, otherwise it will not work. OK Cancel Could not authenticate with Firebase / google-services. If you are a developer, you probably want the API key. In that case, take a look at the readme. Restore No Restore backup? It seems that you have DocScan installed before. Do you want to restore your previous documents?
Taking picture Shoot anyway Locked auto-exposure Unlocked auto-exposure Tip for documents Locking exposure This locks the current exposure and white balance. Please note that we cannot lock these values, after you leave the camera view. Set text direction Do you want to change the orientation of the document text? Do not show this message again. Status:
Manual Automatic Settings
Task time (ms) Focus measure: Page segmentation:
No picture file found. File not found OK
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Hint for automatic mode: Try to solve the issue. If that does not work, switch to manual mode and take a picture manually.
No page found Could not find a page.\n\nSolution: Place the document on another background with a higher contrast to the document.
Move closer The document is too small.\n\nSolution: Decrease the distance between camera and document.
Change perspective The document boundary is not rectangular.\n\nSolution:\n(1) Get the document as parallel to the phone as possible.\n(2) Check if the boundary found is correct.
Rotate The document is rotated.\n\nSolution:\nRotate the document so that it is parallel to your phone.
Calculating focus Please wait, until focus measure is calculated.
Not focused The document appears to be not in focus.\n\nSolution:\nChange the focus point, by tapping on a part of the document that should be focused.
Page already scanned The page is already scanned.\n\nSometimes, if the page is very similar to the preceding page, it may appear to the app that it is the same page.
OK The document quality is fine for imaging.
state unknown state unknown
movement detected The image content or the phone is moving.\n\nSolution:\n(1) Hold the document still or (2) make sure the ScanTent or phone are not moving.
Automatic mode paused Automatic mode is currently paused. No images are taken and no quality measure is applied until the automatic mode is resumed.
searching QR code The app is searching for a QR code.
auto-focusing Camera could not perform an auto focus.\n\nSolution:\nChange the focus point, by tapping on a part of the document that should be focused.
Automated imaging paused Images are now taken automatically Images are taken manually
What\'s new Version 1.7 contains major UI changes.\nDo you want to read more about the UI changes? (Requires an internet connection.)
Email Password Login Please check your login credentials. Welcome Login, please wait User name or password is incorrect. Please reenter your credentials. Login to Transkribus

Rotate 90 degrees Preview mapping Page boundary saved The saved page boundary is used when you transform the images. All document images can be transformed at once in the document view. Open document view

Improve DocScan by sending us a log. Please note that we do not log personal data. Do you want to share your log file now? OK DocScan - Log
holl@cvl.tuwien.ac.at We highly appreciate your feedback! You can leave us a comment here:

Unfortunately, the image was not saved. Please take care that it is captured. Image saving error
Dropbox Transkribus Dropbox Transkribus Offline
It is necessary to allow DocScan to access your Dropbox account. This authentication will be done in your browser. Dropbox Authentication Start authentication Authenticating... Not authenticated Could not authenticate with Dropbox. If you are a developer, you probably want the API key. In that case, take a look at the readme.
Do you really want to logout? You will have to login again if you want to automatically upload your images. Logout Cancel
Your current account: Name: Cloud service: Set up an account: You are currently offline. Please establish a network connection to proceed. Warning: Sync information will be lost Please take care that if you proceed the information about previous uploads will be deleted. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Image upload Uploading to Dropbox. Uploading to Transkribus. Upload finished Finished image upload. Upload canceled Upload canceled on user request. Upload stopped Could not find selected file(s). Upload interrupted Upload postponed. Server is temporary not responding.
Exporting pdf Pdf exported An error happened while creating your pdf, sorry!
No document created The folder is already created. Please use another name. QR code invalid Sorry, the QR code is invalid. Could not create the specified folder. Url not valid The following URL cannot be opened in browser:
Select a document Use selected document
No directory selected Please select at least one folder. documents document Uploading\ Selected was were already uploaded. Upload error An error happened while uploading your files. Please try to upload your files again. Upload error One or more files could not be uploaded, because they are not existing anymore. Please try to upload your documents again. Delete Cancel Delete Are you sure you want to delete Are you sure you want to delete the document? This cannot be undone. from your device?\n\nHint: Documents already uploaded are not deleted from the server, but you cannot add new images to uploaded documents. Finished upload. Your device is currently offline. Upload postponed. Could not login on the server. Upload postponed. Files cannot be uploaded without permission. Deleted file files Images are uploaded in the background upload pending processing, please wait - partially blurred Start upload Delete item Select all items Images: - active image images Cancel Login Cannot start upload You are currently not logged in, please log in first. Log in
Documents Images PDFs
Open Source Licenses
DocScan 2020 Version: Built: Show DocScan intro Open Source Licenses DocScan is developed together with the ScanTent device. Visit our website for more information: \nhttps://scantent.eu DocScan features image uploads to Transkribus. Visit the Transkribus website for further information: \nhttps://transkribus.eu#
This app is especially designed for the ScanTent.\nIf you own a ScanTent: Please put your document inside. Place your phone on the ScanTent Start the automatic mode in the app The text orientation can be changed in the settings Flip pages - images are captured automatically.\n Your scanned images are grouped into documents.\nDocuments can be exported as PDF and uploaded. Trigger flash after automatic imaging to show that an image has been taken. Create a document now Skip
Edit document Save changes
Create new document Document name Create document Show Transkribus metadata Authority This metadata is uploaded to Transkribus but not to other cloud storages. Author Writer Genre Signature URL Allow image publication Handwriting language Please select a language Allow image publication: Yes No Please fill out all Readme2020 fields Please select type Project: readme2020 Help Transkribus to train an HTR model for modern handwritings.
Warp image Image not transformed The image could not be transformed. Please try to adjust the cropping rectangle.
Upload Mobile data Enable uploads over mobile data connection. Additional charges by your provider may arise. Image processing Fast page detection Measure focus Fast page detection with a potential loss of accuracy Display grid Overlays a grid on the camera view Flash after imaging Activates the flash for a second to show that a picture has been taken. This applies only to the series mode.
Debug settings Live preview Show focus values
Show debug view Show computation time of several tasks on top of the camera preview.
Debug settings Settings used mainly for development and measurement of the app performance.
Use Transkribus test server Please restart the app, if you change this. Warning: This setting should only be used for testing the app and the Transkribus server.
Use aggressive auto-focus Every new page is auto-focused in series mode.
Show HUD button Shows a button in the camera view for mirroring the screen. This is useful if you use a mirror or a Head Up Display (HUD) with your ScanTent.
Exif settings Default metadata values saved within images Photographer
Copyright
Crop

This cannot be undone. Delete Cancel OCR not available Sorry, we could not find Google Play services. Try to reinstall the app via Google Play store. Do you want to generate a PDF without OCR? Make PDF machine readable? This will apply OCR and make the text in the picture(s) selectable. Replace images? This will replace the original images and cannot be undone. These images are marked with a red rectangle.

Already uploaded The document is already uploaded. You have to add a new image to start a new upload process.
Crop Are you sure you want to crop all images in the document? This cannot be undone. selected Nothing to do The document contains only images that are already cropped. Uncropped images Some images are not cropped.\nDo you want to proceed with the Some images are not cropped. Cropping option can be found in the overflow menu at the top-right.\nDo you want to proceed with the PDF export upload Delete Are you sure you want to delete the pdf? This cannot be undone.
